short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Verse Extension gives The Verse Tools access to sync your ships located in the RSI website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Syncs your CCUs on the official RSI website https://robertsspaceindustries.com to the CCU Tracker on https://theverse.tools to visualise your ship upgrade channels and plan out your chains and possible upgrades.

 No longer do you need to manually input the data by hand, now it's all handled automatically thanks to the The Verse Extension. 


Privacy Policy: The Verse Extension does not save, transfer or otherwise use any data except for the purpose of accessing pledges on the RSI store to use within The Verse Tools.
